data.market_trends: Increased interest in sustainable travel and experiences such as eco-friendly accommodations and local engagement.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly looking for multi-activity packages that include sightseeing, outdoor adventures, and culinary experiences.
data.competitive_landscape: Norway competes with Scandinavian neighbors; however, its winter scenery and experiences are highly valued. The focus on sustainable tourism sets it apart.
data.seasonal_factors: Winter sports events and holiday festivities attract many visitors, however, January often sees fewer tourists due to post-holiday travel lull.
